comment: Lemma for transfinite recursion. Assuming ~ ax-rep , ` dom recs e. _V <-> recs e. _V ` , so since ` dom recs ` is an ordinal, it must be equal to ` On ` . (Contributed by NM, 14-Aug-1994.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2015.)
